text: Alexander Vincent Sandusky (August 17, 1932 â€“ August 11, 2020) was an American football guard. He played for 13 seasons with the Baltimore Colts of the National Football League (NFL). He was born in McKees Rocks, Pennsylvania. Sandusky died on August 11, 2020 in Louisville, Kentucky just one week before his 88th birthday. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Baltimore Colts players Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh
title: Alex Sandusky
